message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $150.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me in the middle at $125?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $125. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $150 and $125, so I'll offer it to you for $137.50.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $130?
I'm still a bit above my target, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer it to you for $135, which is the highest I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to make another concession, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $128?
I'm getting close to my minimum, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $128. I'll offer it to you for $132.50, which is the lowest I'm willing to go.
I understand you're getting close to your minimum, but I'm still trying to save as much as I can. Would you be willing to meet me at $129?
I'm really close to my minimum, but I'm not willing to go as low as $129. I'll offer it to you for $131, and that's my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $131, which would be $125.50. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
